title: Vulnerable component: commons-beanutils-1.9.4.jar
description: Known vulnerability in Apache Commons BeanUtils 1.9.4 allows manipulation via class property utilities.

title: Possible SQL Injection in UserRepository.findByEmail
description: User-controlled input concatenated into SQL query string.

title: Missing X-Frame-Options Header
description: The response does not include the X-Frame-Options header which helps to mitigate clickjacking attacks.
